name: Bullet-chaser
description:
Bullet-chaser

Fast paced shooter made in three hours for the trijam game jam.

Click to move towards target AND to shoot. 

HINT: The further away the cursor is from the player, the faster the movement AND the faster the bullet. 

Credits:

Game design and programming, Mike Bailey.

Sound from freesound.org:
